title: Comprehensive Undo/Redo System Fix - Pomo-Flow Vue.js App
description: Fix mixed undo/redo implementations causing TypeError: store.tasks.find is not a function and [object Object] console errors. Replace conflicting command pattern + VueUse systems with single unified VueUse approach. Ensure Delete/Shift+Delete/Backspace register in undo history and Cmd+Z/Ctrl+Z visually restores deleted elements.
